 [‹ (x) Classic serif "Monarch" - Bembo {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052654/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16967 "Go to previous forum topic") [Superbowl XL banner ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052654/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16906 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bessd1

comments.content: Even if this is based on an existing typeface, it has been customised beyond recognition. Sorry, can’t help you.

The letters look like your basic black compressed grotesks, though, don’t they? [Helvetica Inserat](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052654/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica-inserat/), [Helvetica Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052654/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/compressed/), or [Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052654/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/impact/), to name a few very close samples.
